issue.title: [C++] Move all factories to type_fwd.h
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7091](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7091). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There's no particular reason why parameter-less factories are in `type_fwd.h`, but the others in their respective implementation headers. By putting more factories in `type_fwd.h`, we may be able to avoid importing the heavier headers in some places.
